question: Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat.Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letterexplain the reasons for the noiseapologisedescribe what action you will take
text: Regarding your letter, I’m really sorry and I feel embarrassed about the inconvenience caused.

Last Sunday, we had that party to celebrate our daughter’s graduation. She had invited her all most all of her friends, and it took longer than we expected it to finish. Since they were young and they overjoyed by their results, they were all over the moon. They sang, they danced and even they had arranged a DJ as well. That was not what we planned initially. But because of their happiness, we couldn’t resist it. Yes, I feel now as we are responsible parents we should have controlled the situation in a much more precise manner.

I advised them thoroughly, not to do such kinds of things in the future and I will assure you I will arrange nothing beyond the limitations and if something special happens, I will notice you in advance. Especially about DJs, that kind of thing will happen again.
Please note again I’m downhearted about the troubles that you and your family faced. Please take this latter as an assurance of preventing such things from happening.
